item.title: New updates available on VMware vCenter, VMware View, Microsoft Virtual Machine Converter and Veeam Backup & Replication
item.description: Over the last days the following updates are released: VMware vCenter Server 5.0 Update 1b VMware View 5.1.1 Microsoft Virtual Machine Converter Plug-in for VMware vSphere beta Veeam Backup & Replication 6.1 Patch 1 Below are the enhancements listed per product. VMware vCenter Server 5.0 Update 1b What’s New: VMware vCenter Server 5.
